body.name: HyperX QuadCast - USB Condenser Gaming Microphone, for PC, PS4, PS5 and Mac, Anti-Vibration Shock Mount, Four Polar Patterns, Pop Filter, Gain Control, Podcasts, Twitch, YouTube, Discord, Red LED
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 22 mins
features: Radiant red lighting with dynamic effects: Stunning red lighting and dynamic effects for an eye-catching shot of customizable style.
Built-in anti-vibration shock mount: Isolate the mic and suppress the sound of unintentional rumbles and bumps with the elastic rope suspension.

Tap-to-mute sensor with LED status indicator: Use the convenient tap-to-mute functionality to prevent an audio accident along with the help of the LED mic status indicator. If the light is on, the mic is active, if the light is off, the mic is muted.

Four selectable polar patterns: Choose between four polar patterns (stereo, omnidirectional, cardioid, bidirectional) to optimize your broadcast setup and keep the focus on the sounds you want to be heard.
Gain control adjustment: Easily adjust your mic sensitivity by turning the dial at the bottom of the QuadCast.

Versatile adapter fits 3/8-inch and 5/8-inch threaded setups, compatible with most mic stands or boom arms. The internal pop filter helps block plosive sounds from hitting the mic, and you can monitor the mic via the headphone jack.

Get great sound whether you’re connecting to a PC, PS5, PS4, or Mac. QuadCast is certified by Discord and TeamSpeak, and works on major streaming platforms like Streamlabs OBS, OBS Studio, and XSplit.
body.description: The HyperX Quad Cast is the ideal all-inclusive standalone microphone for streamers, podcasters and gamers that are looking for a condenser mic with impressive quality sound. The Quad Cast includes its own anti-vibration shock mount to help reduce the sound of any movements. It has a built-in pop filter that reduces any muffles or popping noises for clearer voice quality. Instantly know your mic status with the LED indicator and with the tap-to-mute to easily mute yourself without any delay. Choose between the four polar patterns (Cardioid, Bidirectional, Omnidirectional and Stereo) to fit your streaming needs and adjust the sensitivity by using the gain control knob. Includes a mount adapter that fits both 3/8” and 5/8” thread sizes and is compatible with most microphone stands. Quad Cast is certified by Discord and TeamSpeak to ensure that the Quad Cast is the perfect microphone for broadcasting loud and clear for all your followers and listeners. Whether you’re plugging into a PC, PS4, or Mac, you’ll be able to deliver quality sound to anyone tuning in.Features:Microphone: Power consumption: 5V 125 mA Sample/bit rate: 48Hz/16-bit Element: Electret condenser microphone Condenser type: Three 14mm condensers Polar patterns: Stereo, Omnidirectional, Cardioid, Bidirectional Frequency response: 20Hz – 20kHz Sensitivity: -36dB (1V/Pa at 1kHz) Cable length: 3m Weight: Microphone: 254g Shock mount and stand 364g Total with USB Cable: 710gHeadphone Output: Impedance: 32 Ohms Frequency Response: 20Hz – 20kHz Maximum Power Output: 7mW THD: <0.05% (1kHz/0dBFS) SNR: > 90dB (1kHZ, RL = infinity)Compatible with: PC Windows 10, 8.1, 8, 7, PS4, Mac, Skype, Mumble, Open Broadcaster Software, and XSplit Certified by: Discord and TeamSpeak.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price, easy setup and very stable mic stand.
reviews.reviewText: I got this for the wife recently, she had been using a camera mic forever, and I got tired of trying to understand her in discord when were gaming lol. I'm like say that again, huh, what was that?I saw this on a few reviews, and it looked cool, didn't need a interface or full get up to get it going. Plugged it in, and she was so much more crisp and clear in discord.Setup was easy, not much to do really. We have several cats, and they haven't knocked the mic over once on its standard stand it comes with, its very sturdy. The red color is nice, and the mute button on it works fine for us, although others have said it was a issue.Great purchase, and working as intended. No packaging or setup issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gold Standard for Everyday Gaming and Content Creation
reviews.reviewText: A huge upgrade from any product from Blue, whether it be the Yeti or Snowball, HyperX has proven that they can hang with the big boys of USB microphones. This microphone has all the features you could need for a midrange or even high end setup. It features 4 different audio capture options, including cardioid, stereo, mono, and bi-directional, the lattermost being great for podcasting/1 on 1 interviews. The stand is made out of metal and very stable, so this microphone isn't going to fall over at any point. Very easy to mute and unmute by simply tapping the top like you would any touchscreen, and the red LEDs giving a clear indication that it is unmuted.The sound quality itself is exceptional, very clear and doesn't produce very much USB noise. The microphone has some noise cancellation through the foam in the main chassis, but an additional pop filter is recommended for more noise reduction. It's also very easy to adjust the gain with the slider on the bottom to control the volume of your voice. The microphone also has a line out audio jack that is great for monitoring, and even works well as an external sound card for a laptop or other device in a pinch. No software is needed to get the most out of this microphone, which is very welcome.This is overall one of the best microphones you can get around the $100 range that is from a reputable brand, and has given me no issues and only worked exactly as needed for well over 2 years now. Recommended to anyone looking to do light to heavy amounts of gaming or content creation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable and great sounding
reviews.reviewText: I loved this mic from the moment I popped the box open clear crisp sound even without a pop filter I makes my voice sound great works with my phone using a simple adapter and works perfectly with my laptop. If you're trying to pic between the blue yeti and Hyperx it's Hyperx all the way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This by far has to be one of the best items that I have bought for my computer and gaming experience. Such and easy plug and play experience! Be forewarned that this item does not work on xbox so you will have to find a way to use a different program to join discord or something on an extra screen or some other way. The feedback that I have gotten from my gaming buddies is that there is a huge audio difference when I use the HyperX vs when I use a headset. Overall if you are looking for a good quaility mic, this is for sure worth you time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Real good but not working with App
reviews.reviewText: Really happy overall and strongly recommend it, looks great on desk next to my HP Omen with red accents laptop. You know MICs of laptop can be pretty terrible. Mine is, so muffled people can hardly me like if I whispered (at max sound volume!).Not too bulky or heavy. I would not pick another MC instead, this one is at such a good price at 99$. Love its design! The red string on its sides is actual material though, it's not plastic or metal. The mute button tap on the top is so comfy and efficient.I really wish I could remove the red LED lighting using the HyperX app (which I use for my RGB keyboard) but the app doesn't even detect this MIC. Would have needed the upper model ("S" i think) that has full RGB but not worth the price difference for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect but almost
reviews.reviewText: the mic is perfect and sounds amazing one thing i noticed is in game it sounds low quality than recording in obs but i came to learn that all mics just lower in quality in game chat

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mic upgrade for calls and streaming
reviews.reviewText: Upgraded after years of using the built in mic array of my laptop. Sound quality is 100% improved (full, clear) on recordings. Mute by tapping the top of the mic is simple and obvious to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Plug and play is super easy. I have mine on a boom arm that clamps to my desk. It is currently mounted upside down because it works better in the space and it still works like a charm. I really enjoy the 1tap mute and the Adjustable gain control on the bottom. I have not had a chance to use the different settings because I just use for discord and lite streaming.

reviews.reviewTitle: Gran calidad en todos los sentidos
reviews.reviewText: La verdad es que estoy muy contento con la compra. El micrófono funciona genial. El audio conectado al mic también va de maravilla y el audio que sale es una pasada. Sin duda recomendable para tu Set-up o tus inicios en podcasting o vlogging. También sirve perfecto para conferencias por su entrada múltiple ed audio. Se conecta facilmenta a windos o Mac.Recomendable al 100
Microfone maravilhoso, a qualidade de som é muito boa, e por mais que seja caro, o investimento vale muito a pena!

Lange habe ich mich nach einem guten Mikrofon erkundigt und einschlägige Rezessionen etc. gelesen. Dann jetzt doch das Mikrofon gekauft und bin begeistert. Die Nebengeräusche können gut gefiltert werden und die Sprache ist wie meine Gegenüber mit denen ich mich unterhalte klar und sauber. Hatte vorher ein Headset und wollte es mal ohne was auf dem Kopf zu haben versuchen. Kann sagen: einfach toll für mich.Ich habe mir dieses Mikrofon gekauft, weil der Preis angemessen war und ich keinen Wert auf Farbwechsel während dem Betrieb stehe. Aber wer das möchte, dem sei es gegönnt. Würde mir das Mikrofon jederzeit wieder kaufen.Anzumerken ist noch, dass der mitgelieferte Standfuss sehr wertig, schwer und stabil ist. Er hält das Mikrofon auf jeden Fall an der Position an der es abgestellt wurde.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Solid construction and performance for the price point
reviews.reviewText: I've always loved HyperX products, I have a 7 year old Hyperx Cloud II headset that's still going strong even though the leather is starting to flake off. HyperX construction always feels premium with the brushed metal, soft leather, accent stitched thread, etc and their microphone line follows that same trend. The Quadcast is much bigger and heavier than I expected it to be based on the listing photos. It feels sturdy in the hands. Nothing feels cheap, not even the soft coated plastic parts. It looks sleek, even for a gaming mic. I don't care for the black and red or RGB aesthetic, but HyperX does a good job of toning it down while still making it marketable to that specific crowd. I bought a pop filter that blocks out 90% of the red LED which unfortunately can't be turned off, although it serves the purpose of letting you know that the mic is on and active so it's not all bad. I would recommend a pop filter, although the Quadcast has one built in, it was still picking up some pops from about 7-8 inches from my mouth. Pop filter eliminates it entirely. I also bought a boom arm, the Quadcast's shock stand wasn't able to filter out impact noise from my wood desk, could just be the size and density of my desk and not specifically the stand's fault, but again the boom arm eliminates that issue entirely.As far as performance, I was upgrading from my Hyperx Cloud II mic which has always been subpar so it was a significant difference, all of my friends mentioned it within seconds of hearing me talk on the Quadcast, saying I sounded really clear, like I was "in their head", or like I was on a podcast. This was with no finetuning, now I use the SteelSeries Sonar program for the ClearCast AI noise cancelling, it filters out my keyboard taps and background noise better than Discord's Krispy and also carries over into in-game recordings, Krispy obviously cannot. Also love the mute function. Gentle tap on the end of the mic works every time, super responsive.It's a great mic, I don't think you'll find anything better for the price, this is it. I've already gotten some of my friends to buy it because they were so blown away by how much better and clearer I sound. If you've been considering making the switch from a headset mic, I'd say look no further. You will not be disappointed with this mic.
Forcément, c'est un HyperX donc pas déçu de la qualité.Esthétique, pratique pour couper le son et le remettre.Utilisé depuis trois ans et vraiment satisfait
